name: Earth
description: '''Earth''' is an American [[rock music|rock]] band originally based in [[Olympia, Washington]] and led by the guitarist [[Dylan Carlson (musician)|Dylan Carlson]].{{r|allmusic-bio}} Initially active between 1989 and 1997, their early work is characterized by heavily [[distortion (music)|distorted]] guitar, [[Drone (music)|drones]], and lengthy, [[minimalist]] song structures; their 1993 debut album ''[[Earth 2 (album)|Earth 2]]'' is recognized as a pioneering work of the [[drone metal]] genre.{{r|terrorizer}} The band resurfaced in the early 2000s, with their subsequent output reducing the distortion and incorporating elements of [[country music|country]], [[jazz rock]], and [[folk music|folk]].{{r|terrorizer}} Earth's current lineup consists of Carlson and drummer [[Adrienne Davies]]. Often Bill Herzog is on bass as well as other Earth members, past present and future.
